page.title: 12Stanchester School
page.content:
The school is situated on the outskirts of Stoke-Sub-Hamdon and Montacute. It is set in rambling countryside and you can see St.Micheal's Mount and Ham Hill on a clear day. About 1000 pupils come from villages like; Odcombe, Montacut, Ilchester, Chiselborough, West & East Chinnock, Over Stratton, Yeabridge, Ash, Coat & the larger villages such as Stoke-Sub-Hamdon, South Petherton, & Martock (also Bower-Hinton) There are eight periods a day each being of 35 minutes. The telephone number is 823200. The headmaster is Mr.V.L.Gane and is one of 54 teachers in the school.
{MORE>}
